alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 19 at 3:39PM EDT until April 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE EAST TN VALLEY AND SOUTHWEST NC... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM EDT THURSDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITY ACROSS PORTIONS OF THE EAST TN VALLEY AND SOUTHWEST NC... The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Thursday afternoon through Thursday evening. * TIMING...Noon EDT Thursday to 8 PM EDT Thursday. * WIND...South to southwest winds 10 to 15 mph, with occasional gusts of 20 to 25 mph. * HUMIDITY...Minimum relative humidity values in the low to mid 20s. Isolated areas in the upper teens. * IMPACTS...any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
